title: Daily Skill Development
description: Dedicating 5 hours daily for learning and practicing, completing a new course every 3 days, working on a new project every week, and progressing consistently from certification to certification

title: Top 2% on TryHackMe
description: Ranked in the top 2% of players on TryHackMe, demonstrating advanced cybersecurity skills and practical problem-solving abilities

title: University Honor List Recognition (3 Times)
description: Recognized on the University Honor List for 3 consecutive terms for outstanding academic performance in Cybersecurity

title: Golden Residency Award
description: Awarded a 10-year UAE Golden Residency for consistent academic excellence (valid until 2033)

title: Cultural Insight
description: Resided in the UAE for over 20 years, gaining strong cultural insight and deep local familiarity

title: Licensed Driver
description: Held a valid UAE light vehicle license with 3 years of driving experience, ensuring professional mobility
